data.description: Job Description:The intern position may require office presence of up to 5 days per week.At AT&T, you’ll be empowered to create real change in an ever-expanding, connected world. Your impact will be felt no matter how your work translates to our core goal of serving customers and transforming lives. We’re fueled by a passion to provide innovative solutions and driven to connect the world in meaningful ways.  Join AT&T Summer Internship – Technology, a 10-week experience where interns will have the opportunity to hone skills and knowledge through meaningful work. This position offers hands-on experience, cross-functional collaboration, and exposure to real-world challenges in a fast-paced environment. As part of the internship, you will also have access to a vibrant cohort network with other interns and AT&T leaders. Our AT&T internships offer placements in functional areas, such as marketing, finance, sales, operations, and tech related roles. This internship is designed for students who want broad exposure to how a Fortune 100 company operates – from strategy and finance to operations, marketing and analytics. Interns will be aligned to a specific team within one of our core technical group functions, where they’ll contribute to meaningful work and gain exposure.Priority consideration will be given to students pursuing Technology-related majors.What you’ll do:Depending on placement, interns may support work within areas, such as:Business Care & SalesContracting/Billing Center of ExcellenceData InsightsService DeliveryWireline/Wireless Center of ExcellenceWhat you’ll need:  Curiosity  Boldness  Collaboration  Resourcefulness  What you’ll bring:  Currently enrolled in an undergraduate bachelor's or graduate degree program with strong academic standing, graduating between December 2026 and May 2027.Majoring in Technology, or a related field.Identified leadership capability – academics, athletics, or extracurricular activities.  Strong analytical, organizational, and communication skills.Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-based environment.Our Internship Program interns earn between $23.17 and $32.41 hourly. Not to mention all of the other amazing rewards that working at AT&T offers. Individual starting salary within this range may depend on geography, experience, expertise, and education requirements.  Joining our team comes with amazing perks and benefits:   Medical/Dental/Vision coverage   401(k) plan   Paid time off and holidays (with up to 4 days of paid time off during internship and company-designated holidays.)   Disability benefits (short term and long term)   Employee Assistance Programs (EAP)   Extensive employee wellness   Supplemental benefit programs: critical illness/accident hospital indemnity/group legal   A paid Community Day and can participate in company-sponsored volunteering events    Ready to be the future? It starts with you. Apply today!  Weekly Hours:40Time Type:RegularLocation:Dallas, TexasIt is the policy of AT&T to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, AT&T will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. AT&T is a fair chance employer and does not initiate a background check until an offer is made.
requirements: Currently enrolled in an undergraduate bachelor's or graduate degree program with strong academic standing, graduating between December 2026 and May 2027.
